value.title: A better way to share Personal Bookmarks in Power BI
value.excerpt: A while back Adam shared how you can share a personal bookmark with others. There is now a better way to share personal bookmarks in Power BI if your report is in a workspace. Learn how!  Share Power BI reports and dashboards with coworkers and others https://learn.microsoft.com/power-bi/collaborate-share/service-share-dashboards

value.title: A quick look at the new Power BI Report Builder
value.excerpt: Patrick takes a quick look at Power BI Report Builder including how to get it. This report builder is optimized for the Power BI service. Patrick calls out a few reasons this is the case.  Power BI Paginated Report Builder Now Available https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/power-bi-paginated-report-builder-now-available/

value.title: Are you thinking about your tooltips in Power BI?
value.excerpt: The base tooltips in Power BI are fine. But are you overusing them? Adding everything to them in your visuals? Adam gives you some things to think about with your tooltips!  Create tooltips based on report pages https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/create-reports/desktop-tooltips?tabs=powerbi-desktop

value.title: Combining refresh and real time with Hybrid Tables in Power BI
value.excerpt: Tired of having to wait for the next refresh to see current data in your Power BI Report? Hybrid Tables is here to help you! Patrick looks at how you can use this feature to have an imported table that uses DirectQuery for the most recent data that hasn't been imported yet. BANANAS!  Announcement Blog:

value.title: Convert CSV to Parquet using pySpark in Azure Synapse Analytics

value.title: DAX! Uggg - Where do you start? | Power BI
value.excerpt: Not a coder? Don't understand DAX syntax? DAX can be intimidating and difficult to learn. Frustrating even! Learning DAX can make Power BI very rewarding. Adam has some resources to get you started in your journey.  Beginning the journey:  MS Learn: User DAX in Power BI Desktop (Free) https://docs.microsoft.com/learn/paths/dax-power-bi/

value.title: Debugging a slow Power BI report with Phil Seamark

This uses some new features in Power BI Desktop as well as using DAX Studio to get further insights. value.title: Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration

Using this approach, you can easily keep Power BI updated when team members update an Excel spreadsheet hosted on OneDrive. This is a great alternative to using Google Sheets which can be painful

value.title: Power BI and the On-premises Data Gateway: What is it?
value.excerpt: In this video, we look at the On-Premises Data Gateway. What is it exactly? This can be used with more than just Power BI. This includes PowerApps, Microsoft Flow, Azure Analysis Services and more. The entire Power Platform!   If you found this video helpful, we have a free cheat sheet for you for more
